mapper.select: SELECT /*+ use_nl(C,MIX) */ C.C_MAINSUMNAIL,C.C_NAME,C.C_PRICE,MIX.REC_PERSTATUS FROM CLASS C,(select /*+ use_nl(R,E) */ REC.REC_NO,E.REC_NO,REC.REC_PERSTATUS,REC.C_NO from RECRUIT REC,ENROL E WHERE E.M_NO=99 AND REC.REC_NO=E.REC_NO AND REC.REC_PERSTATUS IN('모집','진행')) mix where C.C_NO=MIX.C_NO;
